version_description:
1. New enemies and bosses
2. Get the chance to spin the turntable after killing bosses!
3. Add defense property
4. Damages can be shown when fighting
5. Higher levels, more coin rewards and more reward multiples!
6. Remove the gold coin magnet. The dragon has magnet itself at the beginning now.
7. Optimize certain UI and tap scope.

2. Add clearance bonus of partly levels
3. Add more unique skins
4. Add permanent double coins pack, permanent revive pack and etc.
5. Optimize landscapes in the scene
